metadata.name: Kottio Premium
metadata.description: This NFT represents a small percentage of profits in the Kottio Immediates corporation. Holders of this NFT type will be paid monthly in ETH with amounts reflective of ten-times the amount that general NFT holders are paid. Holders of this NFT type will also enjoy lifetime membership to all publicly available Kottio Discord Servers, as well as special perks within those servers. ETH payments will be made to the address that holds this NFT and will be paid indefinitely on a monthly basis. More information about this NFT can be found in any of Kottio's Discord Servers.
